name: MountAndShoot
description:
Description

Arcade/Rogue space game with unique combat and challenging opponents. Survive 100 rounds of combat to unlock next tier of ships, different mechanics and more.

Features
  • 10 unique obtainable ships
  • Big boss battles every 5 rounds
  • Dynamic difficulty
Controls
  • mouse - navigation in menu
  • arrows - movement in combat
  • numbers (above letters) - weapons
